body: Accelerate (Time), Burning Flash* (Fire), Corrosive Bolt (Acid), Decelerate (Time), Disappear (Concealing), Discordant Note (Sonic), Enhance Form (Body), Float (Flight), Force Bolt (Force), Frost Fingers (Cold), Gloom (Illumination), Suppress (Dispelling)
